rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0001
rows.name:
Unless you object, starting today this place
will be your second home.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0002
rows.name:
First, we need to find you a place to live.
Follow me.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0003
rows.name:
Brave citizens of NLA! Good day.
This is Director General Maurice Chausson.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0004
rows.name:
Today, once again, I have some proud news
that I wish to share with you all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0005
rows.name: Yesterday, another 10 crew members were recovered.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0006
rows.name:
Welcoming these individuals, with their various expertise and skills,
as citizens of NLA...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0007
rows.name:
will further strengthen our city's foundation
and allow us to develop even more.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0008
rows.name: This is solely thanks to[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0009
rows.name:
my proposal, which stressed the importance
of planetary surface exploration[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0013
rows.name: Since when was he Director General?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0014
rows.name: Two days ago.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0015
rows.name:
He was just an aide until then, and now he's acting like he's
president or prime minister... It's unbearable, right?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0016
rows.name: Iriina, Gwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0017
rows.name: Thank you for your hard work on the mission, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_JNK0010
rows.name: Interested.

rows.label: xs01010100_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask more about these two.

rows.label: xs01010100_JNK0020
rows.name: Question.

rows.label: xs01010100_SEL0021
rows.name: Ask what "Colonel" means.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0018
rows.name:
Let me introduce you.
This is Iriina, and this is Gwin.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0019
rows.name: Colonel, is that the one you mentioned?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0019_m
rows.name: Colonel, is that the one you mentioned?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0019_f
rows.name: Colonel, is that the one you mentioned?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0020
rows.name:
The only survivor
found in Meteor Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0020_m
rows.name:
The only survivor
found in Meteor Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0020_f
rows.name:
The only survivor
found in Meteor Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0021
rows.name:
What?[ST:wide ]― But the Director General just said
there were ten[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0022
rows.name:
He probably thinks that if he doesn't say stuff like that,
people will lose all hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0023
rows.name: Still, I'm glad even one person made it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0024
rows.name:
Iriina, from the Interceptor.
Good to meet you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0025
rows.name:
I'm Gwin, also with the Interceptor,
just like Lieutenant Iriina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0026
rows.name: Please treat me well.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0027
rows.name:
Iriina and Gwin, like me, were originally part of
the Coalition Forces Special Operations Heavy Armor Training.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0028
rows.name: Commonly known as officers of the Doll Squad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0029
rows.name:
I was a Colonel, Iriina was a Lieutenant,
and Gwin was just a rookie back then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0030
rows.name:
I keep telling them there's no need to keep holding onto those ranks
now that we're on a planet like this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0031
rows.name:
Just because we're BLADEs now
doesn't mean how I feel about you has changed, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0032
rows.name:
If it was a former superior I couldn't respect,
I'd be speaking informally to him by now, even if he was a General.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0033
rows.name: Lieutenant Iriina is crazy about Colonel Elma, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0034
rows.name:
You both seem determined to say that calling me by rank
is a sign of respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0035
rows.name:
Iriina and Gwin, like me, were originally part of
the Coalition Forces Special Operations Heavy Armor Training.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0036
rows.name: Commonly known as officers of the Doll Squad.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0037
rows.name:
I was a Colonel, Iriina was a Lieutenant,
and Gwin was just a rookie back then.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0038
rows.name:
I keep telling them there's no need to keep holding onto those ranks
now that we're on a planet like this, but...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0039
rows.name:
Just because we're BLADEs now
doesn't mean how I feel about you has changed, Colonel.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0040
rows.name:
If it was a former superior I couldn't respect,
I'd be speaking informally to him by now, even if he was a General.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0041
rows.name: Lieutenant Iriina is crazy about Colonel Elma, you know.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0042
rows.name:
You both seem determined to say that calling me by rank
is a sign of respect.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0043
rows.name: Colonel, is that the one you mentioned?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0043_m
rows.name: Colonel, is that the one you mentioned?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0043_f
rows.name: Colonel, is that the one you mentioned?[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0044
rows.name:
The only survivor
found in Meteor Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0044_m
rows.name:
The only survivor
found in Meteor Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0044_f
rows.name:
The only survivor
found in Meteor Valley.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0045
rows.name:
What?[ST:wide ]― But the Director General just said
there were ten[ST:wide ]―[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0046
rows.name:
He probably thinks that if he doesn't say stuff like that,
people will lose all hope.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0047
rows.name: Still, I'm glad even one person made it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0048
rows.name:
Iriina, from the Interceptor.
Good to meet you.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0049
rows.name:
I'm Gwin, also with the Interceptor,
just like Lieutenant Iriina.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0050
rows.name: Please treat me well.

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0051
rows.name:
Alright, we're heading off to our mission now.
Excuse us, Colonel Elma.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0052
rows.name:
Right, let's head to the BLADE Home.
That's where you'll be living for the time being.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: xs01010100_MSG0033_2
rows.name: [ST:space ]
